description: How many clicks from each ad type should Custom Tees purchase to maximize the number of unique clicks within the Budget? Consider the following parameters: the total number of advertisement types (A), costs of purchasing a click from each advertisement type (Costs), the maximum number of clicks that can be purchased from each advertisement type (MaxClicks), the number of young audience clicks from each advertisement type (YoungClicks), the number of old audience clicks from each advertisement type (OldClicks), and the number of unique clicks from each advertisement type (UniqueClicks). Additionally, consider the goals for the number of clicks from the young (GoalYoung) and old (GoalOld) audience, as well as the goals for the number of unique clicks from the young (GoalUniqueYoung) and old (GoalUniqueOld) audience.
